somehow.translation[0].definitions[0].de: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how
somehow.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other.
somehow.translation[0].definitions[1].de: for some reason that is not clear to you or that you do not understand
somehow.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Somehow, I just don’t think it’ll work.
